events.message: I received my order last week but the product isn't what I expected. I want to return it and get a full refund.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to customer's request for return and money back.
An agent was assigned to handle the refund request and communicate further with the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that you’re not satisfied with your purchase. I’m here to help process your return and refund.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item does not match the description on your website, so I would like a refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a return shipping label for you, and once we receive the product, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the clear instructions and look forward to returning the product.
We have received the returned item and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount back on your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund was completed and there are no outstanding issues, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
